subject: Re: Sweep Tuning of AM Radio Band - FWIW
author: kenneth b thomas
full_text:
not everyone is predestined to geek-hood and of those that are many 
of those are not allowed matches in the "home"  :}(kidding of course)

build a crystal radio set, get a pack of germanium point contact 1n34 
diodes from radio shack. put earphone in ear.  tune to strong local 
station.  strike a match and heat wire right whereit exits glass on 
side opposite to black band.  continue till you hear white noise or 
station gets louder or match burns down.  thats usually enough.

plug diode into tape recorder in classic diode/mic evp fashion

OR...

i can probably work something else out if frank (the peoples choice) 
okays it.

the techies and mediumistic types need to help each other out till 
then
